channel.description: def add_score(scores): name = input("Enter a name: ") score = int(input("Enter a score: ")) scores[name] = score def average_score(scores): total = 0 for key, value in scores.items(): total = total + value return total / len(scores) def main(): scores = {} for i in range(4): add_score(scores) print(average_score(scores)) main()
